name: Best Com. Plug Loads (EE+DF)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Average of 'Total Cost (2020 $)' values for 'Tier 2 APS' ($83.5/unit), converted from $/unit to $/ft^2 floor assuming 1:1 ratio of APS:Occupant and 200 ft^2 floor/occupant, using large office reference case (498K sf, 2490 occupants, $207915 total cost per building)

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

source_data.title: U.S. Department of Energy Commercial Reference Building Models of the National Building Stock
source_data.author: Deru et al. 2011

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

_description: Adjust plug load levels down to shed peak period electricity use, in tandem with installing plug load efficiency package generally corresponding to AEDG 50% guideline
